import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from "react" import { AiOutlineTags, AiOutlineClockCircle, AiOutlineHeart } from "react-icons/ai" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import { Context } from "../../context/Context" export const Profile = (card) => { <>
{card.map((item) => (
{item.categories.map((c) => ( #{c.name} ))}

{item.title}

{item.desc.slice(0, 180)}...

{" "}
))}
}
